snippet: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s.
abstract: Charlie Porter, self-taught mountaineer and climate scientist who became most famous for climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park, dies at age 63.

byline.contributor: Pascale Bonnefoy contributed reporting from Santiago, Chile.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s.

headline.main: Charlie Porter, an Adventurer Scaling Rock and Sailing Seas, Is Dead at 63
headline.print_headline: Charlie Porter, 63, a Solitary Adventurer Who Reshaped the Ascent of a Monolith
